Author: Alt-index
Title: PRE-SALE IS ON! [ANN] [ICO] ALTINDEX | THE FIRST AUTOMATED INDEX FUND OF TOKENS
Body: Hi everyone, bitcointalkers.  http://i63.tinypic.com/2nbh99d.jpg  ALTINDEX is a token index fund that uses the transparency and low costs offered by the blockchain technology, the index fund automatically monitors the token market as a whole. ALX is the token of ALTINDEX and its value is directly related to the value of the 20 best tokens of the moment by real market capitalization.  The peculiarity of ALTINDEX compared to other index funds is that it only tracks tokens. The word “token” in English defines objects similar to the coins that give the right to enjoy a certain property of goods or services, created by the distributor of said goods or services.  http://i66.tinypic.com/jfevbq.png  An autonomous weighted index fund that does not require an extensive human capital for its correct development, with a portfolio composed of the 20 main tokens by total capitalization and with weekly rebalancing produces a combination with ample exposure to the market and an acceptable billing without allowing one asset (and, for therefore, a single source of risk) dominates the others.  ALTINDEX is about to establish a new standard for investments in crypto actives, as a transparent, safe and directly linked to its assets. ALTINDEX aims to invest in tokens with low commission costs and a wide exposure to the market with its innovative offer of individualized tokens.  http://i68.tinypic.com/kedvua.png  Suscribe to our newsletter and follow us in telegram: https://t.me/altindex  www.alt-index.com  http://i67.tinypic.com/kedtm0.png  http://i67.tinypic.com/4ugwt2.png  http://i68.tinypic.com/71mbs6.png  http://i66.tinypic.com/292bejp.png

Author: Alt-index
Title: PRE-SALE IS ON! [ANN] [ICO] ALTINDEX | THE FIRST AUTOMATED INDEX FUND OF TOKENS
Body: Hi, vinayak2628  Our "bounty" campaign is the price of our token in the early stages of pre-sale and ICO, we can't give away tokens because may we'll harm the product. In its pre-sale ALX start in 0.90 USD more here> https://www.alt-index.com/#token  Quote from: kalincoolcute on April 14, 2018, 06:21:51 AM Do you plan to create a roadmap? Is there a white paper in its future? What features will this coin have that can grow the community?  Hi, kalincoolcute  Yes, we have a roadmap > https://www.alt-index.com/#roadmap  And yes, we have too a whitepaper, just here >https://www.alt-index.com/wp/whitepaper_altindex_en.pdf  Our coin is an index fund based on ERC20, we're the first automated index fund of tokens, and it's a good solution for a long-range investors, we have annual fees of only 0.5%    Quote from: flysohigh.noshy on April 14, 2018, 06:29:14 AM where I can find the other information about the project, can be found on the website?  Hey, flysohigh.noshy  Yes, we have all the information on web, and you can see our video here: https://youtu.be/yToRCLQ-zNc  Quote from: sawsaw987jig on April 14, 2018, 06:35:43 AM Interesting project but we would like to know more about the team who are behind this because no profile links are available to get more details.  Hi, sawsaw987jig  Our team is https://www.alt-index.com/#team you can search on google that, we are transparent. You can see, for example, Vicent Nos, he's CEO of Lescovex, and advisor of many ICO's too.  Quote from: douinaho on April 14, 2018, 07:50:09 AM I think your project is good and interesting but I want to ask what is the purpose of your project? and where is the information about your teams?  Hi douinaho Our project wants to give the tool to investors of all kinds to diversify their portfolio in the world of cryptocurrencies and obtain long-term and short-term benefits thanks to low annual costs, we are also the first to make a token index;)  Quote from: davidcrumble2 on April 15, 2018, 05:43:28 AM Any road maps I can check on? Any websites I can find more information?  Hi davidcrumble2  Yes all is on www.alt-index.com, and in some media!
